ModMetaData.name: Area Rugs v1.03
ModMetaData.author: Fisty and Darc
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds to RimWorld: ---------------- 1 Door mat (rotate to align correctly with doorway) 7 Circle rugs (1x1 to 7x7 tiles) 7 Square rugs (1x1 to 7x7 tiles) 6 Hall runners (1x2 to 1x7 tiles) 8 Rectangle rugs (2x3 to 5x7 tiles) 10 New cloth colors ----------------
